name: (C) Ref. Case RTU, NG Heat
_description: Ref. case gas furnace integrated in packaged rooftop unit

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of typical commercial RTU lifetime

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Admnistration

notes: Heating multiple of 92% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is gas packaged unit (14491406 sf) by square feet in shiwch main heating equipment is gas furnace or packaged unit (176461522 sf)

cooling multiple of 60% was determined by dividing square feet in which cooling equipment is packaged AND heating equipment is natural gas (214306467 sf) by square feet with same cooling constraint and heating across all fuel types (357885079 sf).
